content: twice round 37 ssk k10 k2tog twice round 38 ssk k8 k2tog twice round 39 ssk k6 k2tog twice round 40 ssk k4 k2tog twice round 41 ssk k2 k2tog twice round 42 ssk k2tog 4 sts remain break yarn and pull thru remaining live sts pull tight to close the top of the mitten weave in ends and enjoy 2 ©2014 andrea mowry all rights reserved pattern for personal use only designer can be contacted at mowry andrea@gmail com
